greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n - A264977(n).
comment: Note that A264977(n) gives the value of the n-th Stern polynomial (cf. A260443, A125184) evaluated at X=2 over the field GF(2), while n gives the value of the same polynomial evaluated at X=2 in the usual way.
Each term seems to be a multiple of 4.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 16 2015
